quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Character and Saw
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, actor, saw. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: Who was the director of the 1975 movie One Flew Over the Cuckoos Nest?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Milos Forman

questions.question: In Saw II, the needle pit test was meant for which character?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Xavier

questions.question: Actor Tobin Bell, who portrayed the serial killer Jigsaw, used a dummy for his bathroom scenes in the original Saw movie.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: In what part of Italy was Don Vito Corleone born in Francis Ford Coppolas 1972 film The Godfather?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Sicily

questions.question: What Hollywood actor and singer performed the song Singin in the Rain in the 1952 musical film Singin in the Rain?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Gene Kelly

questions.question: In Saw III the shotgun collar was one of Jeffs tests.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: In the movie “Police Academy”, Mahoney gets into a fight in the lunch room with two other cadets which gives the lieutenant the green light to finally throw him out of the academy. What is the name of the two cadets for which Mahoney has an altercation with?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Copeland and Blankes

questions.question: The original Saw movie was shot in 18 days.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: Which of the following traps was dubbed the most infamous trap used in the Saw movies and involved the character named Amanda?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Reverse beartrap

questions.question: What were the names of the tests that Jeff was given in Saw III?

options.text: intestine pool, flammable jelly, razor wire maze

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: rack, freezer room, intestine pool

questions.question: What is the first trap seen in Saw II?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: death mask

questions.question: In the first Saw movie, the character named Mark, committed workmans comp fraud.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: The 1961 movie West Side Story was base on this play by William Shakespeare.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Romeo and Juliet

questions.question: The Razor box trap in Saw II was meant for Gus.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: In Saw III, the classroom trap, the first trap we see, involves which character?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Troy

options.text: The Man with the Golden Gun

questions.question: In the movie The Crow, which of these is the bar of Top Dollar, one of Eric and Shellys murderers?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Club Trash

questions.question: Which movie that hit the big screen in 1979 included the following lines?

options.text: lonel Lucas: Your mission is to proceed up the Nung River in a Navy patrol boat. Pick up Colonel Kurtzs path at Nu Mung Ba, follow it and learn what you can along the way. When you find the Colonel, infiltrate his team by whatever means available and terminate the Colonels command.
lonel Lucas: You understand Captain that this mission does not exist, nor will it ever exist.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Apocalypse Now

questions.question: This dialogue is from the 1941 movie CItizen Kane.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: Who is Gold Leader in the Battle of Endor in Episode VI:  Return of the Jedi?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Lando Calrissian

questions.question: Why was Timothy in the Rack trap in Saw III?

options.text: He was responsible for the death of Jeffs son.
He fled the scene of a crime.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: He was responsible for the death of Jeffs son.

questions.question: The following conversation is from the 1983 movie Bad Boys.

options.text: ptain Howard: Until then, until then, you are Mike Lowrey, you be him, thats what you are, youre him.
ptain Howard: Youre him, I dont wanna hear it, youre him. And you, youre you, you be you, but not in front of her. Youre him, youre you.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: This is from which Will Smith movie?

options.text: ristopher Gardner: Hey. Dont ever let somebody tell you... You cant do something. Not even me. All right?
ristopher Gardner: You got a dream... You gotta protect it. People cant do somethin themselves, they wanna tell you you cant do it. If you want somethin, go get it. Period.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Pursuit of Happyness

questions.question: Who directed Episode V:  The Empire Strikes Back?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Irvin Kershner

questions.question: What are the missing words in this quote by villain T Bird, a character in The Crowd: You know, ____ ____ actually caught on fire once from all the crap floating around in it. I wish I couldve seen that.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Lake Erie

questions.question: This exchange is from the 1983 movie The Return of the Living Dead.

options.text: n: Oh, hell! Any good five men could do that!
n: Well, if theres that much, theyll probably get us wherever we are.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Bob and Work
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, novels, interview. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: In What About Bob, after Bob Wiley has dinner with the Marvin family and torments Dr. Marvin further by making weird noises through dinner, the family asks him to stay the night because its storming outside. Bob rooms with Sigmund, who instantly bonds with Bob. What disease do they talk about?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Tourettes syndrome

questions.question: After the interview, Dr. Marvin from the movie What About Bob? tries to get rid of Bob by calling a fellow psychiatrist and convincing her to have Bob committed. When she calls Dr. Marvin back to the institution to pick up Bob, after just a few minutes of being there, what is Bob doing with the doctors?

options.text: discussing certain medicines and their effects

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: telling jokes

questions.question: In the film What About Bob?, Bob Wiley (played by Bill Murray) has been dropped by a number of psychiatrists because of his neediness level. After Bobs first appointment with Dr. Marvin (played by Richard Dreyfuss), what does Dr. Marvin do?

options.text: calls and yells at his colleague who pawned Bob off on him
tells Bob hes going on vacation
tells Bob to get another psychiatrist

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: tells Bob hes going on vacation

questions.question: What happens to Dr. Marvin on the way back home from the institution in What About Bob?, after he dumps Bob off and strands him in the middle of nowhere?

options.text: A vehicle drives by and splashes mud all over him.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: all of these

questions.question: What a sweet lady!  She loves Paul Sheldons novels and NEVER uses canned tomatoes in her meatloaf. As Annie Wilkes tells Paul Sheldon Theres nothing to worry about. Youre going to be fine. Im your number one fan. What actress swings a mighty mean sledgehammer in this film based on a Steven King novel?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Kathy Bates

questions.question: In the movie What About Bob?, what does Dr. Marvin do to Bob in order to finally get rid of him?

options.text: takes Bob out on the boat and tries to drown Bob by pushing him out of the boat
hires a hitman to kill Bob
locks Bob up in the institution again by telling lies about Bob
ties 20 pounds of dynamite around Bob and leaves him in the woods

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: ties 20 pounds of dynamite around Bob and leaves him in the woods

questions.question: Mobster and monster, Cody Jarrett, went out in a blaze of glory, literally. In what movie does Cody Jarrett declare Made it, Ma, top of the world! just before the gas tank he is sitting on explodes?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: White Heat

questions.question: At the end of the What About Bob movie, Bob marries Lily, (Dr. Marvins sister) and then becomes a psychologist himself, writing a book called Death Therapy.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: In the movie My Girl, when Vada attends her writing class for the last time, she reads a poem. What is it about?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Thomas J.

questions.question: What year did the film What About Bob? come out?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 1991

questions.question: Who told Vadas dad, Harry, about Thomas J.s death in the movie My Girl?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: a police officer

questions.question: When Bob from the movie What About Bob? is on the bus to go to Lake Winnipesaukee in New Hampshire, what does he have around his neck?

options.text: his goldfish Gil in a glass jar
some garlic cloves in a bottle

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: his goldfish Gil in a glass jar

questions.question: Dr. Marvins family featured in the movie What About Bob? really likes Bob Wiley. What does Dr. Marvins daughter Anna invite Bob to do with her?

options.text: go sailing with her and her friends

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: go sailing with her and her friends

questions.question: In What About Bob?, when Dr. Marvin finally gets home, the family treats him to a surprise birthday party. What does Dr. Marvin see that pushes him over the edge?

options.text: Bob carrying the cake and licking the frosting
Bob with his arms around Dr. Marvins kids
Bob with his arm around Dr. Marvins sister, Lily
Bob opening one of Dr. Marvins presents

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Bob with his arm around Dr. Marvins sister, Lily

questions.question: All work and no play makes Jack a dull boy. All work and no play makes Jack a dull boy. All work and no play makes Jack a dull boy. All work and no play makes Jack a dull boy. All work and no play makes Jack a dull boy. All work and no play makes Jack a dull boy. All work and no play makes Jack a dull boy. All work and no play makes Jack a dull boy. All work and no play makes Jack a dull boy. What actor wrote these words?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Jack Nicholson
